newsitem.title: USA: Karrington says completes Kensington buy.
newsitem.headline: Karrington says completes Kensington buy.

text.p: Karrington Health Inc said Monday it completed the acquisition of the privately held Kensington Management Group Inc for about $28 million in cash, stock and debt financing.
The company said the deal included about 136,000 of Karrington common shares and about $23 million in new and assumed debt financing.
The company said Kensington, which has about $10 million in annual revenue, operaters or has under construction 12 Alzheimer's care facilties.
Karrington owns and operates assisted-living residences with an emphasis on Alzheimer's care.
